text: Maine-Ocean Express () is a 1986 French comedy film directed by Jacques Rozier. == Cast == * Bernard Ménez - Le controleur Le Garrec * Yves Afonso - Petitgas Marcel * Luis Rego - Le controleur Lucien Pontoiseau * Lydia Feld - Maître Mimi de Saint-Marc * Rosa-Maria Gomes - Dejanira * Pedro Armendáriz Jr. - Pedro De La Moccorra * Bernard Dumaine - Le Président du Trubunal * Jean- Paul Bonnaire - Le prosecureur * - Lucien Vallée == References == == External links == * Category:1986 comedy films Category:French films Category:Films set in Nantes
title: Maine-Ocean Express
